title: Whispers Radio Oct 8, 2008 Heidi Hollis
description:
Tonight on Whispers we will be welcoming Heidi Hollis to the show. Heidi Hollis will be discussing her new book called Jesus Is No Joke: A True Story of an Unlikely Witness Who Saw Jesus. As a one-time skeptic of reported encounters with Jesus, and a UFO and paranormal author/researcher, Hollis shares how she changed her position on Jesus encounters after experiencing four of her own. She also shares about her visits to both Heaven and Hell and the reality of both.

Show Notes: http://www.whispersradio.com/index.php/component/content/85?task=view
